data.eml:eml: Redescription of Stenolophus thoracicus Casey (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Harpalini), a valid species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bousquet, Yves, Messer, Peter W. (2010): Redescription of Stenolophus thoracicus Casey (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Harpalini), a valid species. ZooKeys 53: 25-31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.53.470, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.53.470
